title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 803.3 - Designation of fiscal officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 803.3 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) Guy N. Childs, Treasurer, Administration Building, Port of Albany, Albany, N.Y. 12202 is designated the fiscal officer, who shall certify the payroll and
respond to requests, in accordance with section
803.6
(b) of this

Part, for an itemized record setting forth the name, address, title and salary
of every officer or employee of the agency. (b) The fiscal officer shall make the payroll
items listed above available to any person including bona fide members of the
news media as required under section 88(1) (g), (1) (i), and (10) of the

Freedom of Information Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
803.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
